product.name: Cookie Boxes
product.description:
Wholesale Custom Printed Cookie Box Packaging

To preserve delightful cookie products the manufacturers need firm packaging. cookie boxes give protection from moisture so the quality is preserved. PackagingAid is offering reliable packaging with high qualities and low prices.

We feel proud of the fact that we consider every cost-cutting aspect. From the manufacturing boxes to shipping at your doorsteps. We provide cost-effective solutions and charge wholesale prices for your custom cookie boxes. Let’s have a spectacular experience of reduced costs and maximum savings.

Packaging & Food Safety

Package design and production play a vital role in limiting the shelf life of a food product. The right choice of packaging materials keeps product quality fresh.

Advancement in food packaging plays a central role in keeping the U.S. food supply among the safest in the world. Packaging retains the benefits of food processing after the process is finished. It allows food to travel reliably for long distances and still be nutritious at the time of consumption.

Packaging technology must adjust food protection with other concerns too. Including service and material expenses, emphasized environmental awareness. This is where Packaging-Aid cardboard cookie boxes are beneficial. They give a perfect packaging box free of chemicals and contagions.

Quality Material Suppliers

The factor that requires prior attention is the cookie box material. Corrugated cookie boxes are made up of material that makes them ideal for massive orders. Kraft or card stock is ideal for food packaging. It comes in natural brown, unbleached, heavy-duty, and bleached white. The natural kraft is the most substantial.

No need to worry about the material quality as PackagingAid overcomes all your worries. By offering you the takeout boxes leak-proof and add multi-layered cardboard sheets that store your baked food. Airtight packaging protects it from getting rotted by hazardous factors.

Cookie boxes With Display Windows

Want to display your gorgeous cookie masterpieces? PackagingAid creates durable and presentable cookie boxes with windows. You can easily display the quality of your products and the effort you took to create a lavish design. Unique outlook, which in itself is sufficient to heighten the beauty of the product packed inside.

These cookie display boxes can be customized according to the requirements of the customers. You can also add windows cut in the shape of your choice. On your wedding day, you can order cookie items as a sign of love. For sale for valentine’s day, the boxes take the shape of red-colored hearts with a PVC window.

Free Shipping

Worried about the shipping cost and handling? You don’t need to! PackagingAid offers a free shipping facility on every order of cookie boxes wholesale to make sure that your product is delivered to you at your desired location without any harm. After ordering wholesale cookie boxes you get your shipment tracking id from our client care department to check your shipment status.
product.metaDescription: Buy customized cookie boxes at reasonable rates. We provide you premium quality wholesale cookie boxes with die-cut windows. Custom cookie display boxes can be customized according to the requirements of the customers.

product.shortDescription:
Custom Cookie Boxes

Nobody likes having an offensive cookie box on their shelves. Custom cookie boxes enhance their exquisiteness and refinement. Do you have innovative ideas to make your cookie box well-defined? Wholesale custom cookie boxes are well-designed and used for this purpose. The packaging is composed in a way to cater to your demands.

PackagingAid.com is the name of affordability and premium quality. Digital Artwork and offset presses along with the latest methods secure the first-rated printing of cookie products. We employ the finest materials for the manufacturing of our cookie boxes. Furthermore, our boxes are quality tested at multiple levels to secure their strength and stability.
